Details:
* **Type**: Boolean
* If you want iDRAC telemetry support on your OIM or service cluster, set this variable to ``true`` before executing ``prepare_oim.yml`` or ``service_k8s_cluster.yml`` playbook.
              
              * **OIM**: If you want to collect iDRAC telemetry data from the OIM, set this variable to ``true``. When set to ``true``, Omnia deploys the ``idrac_telemetry_receiver``, ``mysqldb``, and ``activemq`` containers on the OIM during the execution of the ``prepare_oim.yml`` playbook.
              * **Service cluster**:  If you want to collect iDRAC telemetry data from the service cluster nodes, set this variable and ``federated_idrac_telemetry_collection`` to ``true``. When both variables are set to ``true``, Omnia deploys the iDRAC telemetry pods on the ``service_kube_node``. These pods include the ``idrac_telemetry_receiver``, ``mysqldb``, ``prometheus_pump``, and ``activemq`` containers, and are created during the execution of the ``service_k8s_cluster.yml`` playbook.
* **Accepted values**: ``true`` or ``false``
* **Default value**: ``false``

.. note:: If ``idrac_telemetry_support`` is set to ``true``, ``mysqldb_user``, ``mysqldb_password``, and ``mysqldb_root_password`` parameters in the ``omnia_config_credentials.yml`` file becomes mandatory.

* **Type**: String
* Specifies the tool that collects the iDRAC telemetry data. This parameter is mandatory if ``idrac_telemetry_support`` is set to ``true``.
* If ``idrac_telemetry_support`` is set to ``true`` and ``idrac_telemetry_collection_type`` is ``prometheus``, then the ``prometheus`` and ``prometheus_pump`` containers are deployed during the execution of the ``prepare_oim.yml`` playbook.
* **Accepted value**: ``kafka``
* **Sample**: ``idrac_telemetry_collection_type: "kafka"``
